name: Yamaha R1 (Indo. Version)
description: The R1 is powered by a 998cc crossplane 4 cylinder 4-valve engine that develops 200PS - without ram air pressurization. Derived from our winning YZR-M1 MotoGP bike, its crossplane crankshaft gives an uneven 270째 - 180째 - 90째 - 180째 firing sequence for high levels of linear torque.

name: Yamaha XHR (Dubai Version)
description: Yamaha XSR 155 Price in Bangladesh is Tk 545,000.00. XSR powered by 155.1 cc which generates Maximum power 19.3 HP @ 10,000 rpm and its maximum torque is 14.7 NM @ 8500 rpm. Yamaha XSR 155 mileage is 50 KM per Liter (approx).
